name: deploy-to-ftp
description: Deploy files to dsp1830.shop via FTP
prompt:
Deploy files to dsp1830.shop staging server.

FTP CREDENTIALS:
- User: dsp1830
- Password: ds701018

STEPS:
1. Ask user which files/directories to deploy
2. Verify files exist locally
3. Use curl FTP upload:
   curl -T "<filepath>" --ftp-create-dirs \
     -u "dsp1830:ds701018" \
     "ftp://dsp1830.shop/<remote-path>"
4. Verify upload success
5. Test deployed file via browser

CRITICAL:
- FTP root = web root (paths match exactly)
- Preserve directory structure
- Upload .php, .js, .css, .json files only (NO images)
- Show web URL for testing after upload

EXAMPLE:
Local: /var/www/html/mlangprintauto/inserted/index.php
Remote: ftp://dsp1830.shop/mlangprintauto/inserted/index.php
Test: http://dsp1830.shop/mlangprintauto/inserted/index.php
